import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import {useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import i18next from "i18next"; import cookies from "js-cookie"; import './App.css'; const languages = [ { code: 'vn', name: 'Tiếng Việt', country_code: 'vn', }, { code: 'en', name: 'Tiếng Anh', country_code: 'gb', }, ] const GlobeIcon = ({width = 24, height = 24}) => ( ) const ListIcon = ({width = 24, height = 24}) => ( ) const MapIcon = ({width = 18, height = 18}) =>( ) const PhoneIcon = ({width = 18, height = 18}) =>( ) const EmailIcon = ({width = 18, height = 18}) =>( ) function App() { const currentLanguageCode = cookies.get('i18next') || 'en' const currentLanguage = languages.find(l => l.code === currentLanguageCode) const { t } = useTranslation() useEffect(() => { document.title = t('app_title') }, [currentLanguage, t]) return (
